ComicInfo.Series: Jenny Sparks: The Secret History of the Authority
ComicInfo.Summary:
The origin of Jack Hawksmoor is revealed! Jenny Sparks meets Hawksmoor for the first time: an eleven-year-old boy dying in the Maine countryside who claims alien surgeons are turning him into a superhuman while his parents are asleep. Discover the terrifying truth behind Hawksmoor's origin and the secret Jenny was forced to keep from all of humanity. You'll never look at Jack Hawksmoor the same way again.
A young boy plays with friends in a ballpark, then everything freezes. He knows what’s happening, as it has happened to him before.The boy's surroundings then shift; he is in a tank with alien devices surrounding him. Everything goes dark. He regains consciousness, and finds himself back in the ballpark, naked and covered in an alien substance.24th February 1976. Jenny is in Russia, speaking with scientists about a strange man held in a containment cube. The scientists inform her that the man in the cube is known as Jack Hawksmoor. For as long as Jack can remember, he has been abducted by aliens from the future. Their intention is to evolve Jack so that he can combat a lifeforce that has already obliterated the 70th Century. Jack is abducted once more whilst in the company of Jenny. Jenny enquires the scientists how often this occurs, ans is told it happens every couple of hours. The scientists are pessimistic over Jack's chances of survival. Jenny is taken from the lab into a hall filled with super beings who have been called in to help prevent the future threat from the 70th century. Jenny is then told she was drafted to lead this army into battle. She resists at first, but quickly issues demands if she is to lead the team, stating the team needs her more than she needs the team.3rd March 1976. A fleet of ships head toward an undisclosed location. Jenny waits for the enemy to arrive. The enemy appears. Jenny enquires about the enemy and is told that it is the city of Kansas, now a sentient, living city. The city opens fire on the ships. Jenny order the jets in, followed quickly by the heroes.As the battle ensues, Jenny converts herself to her energy form and attacks the city, but is repelled. Jenny orders Jack into the battle. Nearby, Japan starts to shake, growing and evolving into a humanoid form, until it stands up and grabs Kansas. Jack, now merged with the city, has turned it into a giant battle-suit. Jack uses Japan to smash Kansas to pieces. November 1976. One of Jenny’s demands is met: going forward, the scientists are unaware of Jack's location since the incident in the South Pacific.
